metadata.name: Deep Healing Spot 2
metadata.description:
State of being: Deep Healing.
Composition according to the sacred-symbolic chromatic circle: green, pink and blue.
This composition stimulates healing, love, affection, compassion, health, longevity, gratitude, devotion and mercy.
This sacred spot is a microscopic image of this state of being, Deep Healing, but at the same time it is a macrocosmic image of it.
The invitation is to dive into the healing depths of color.
Crypto asset created from a work done in acrylic on wood.
